name: Submachine Universe Location
summary: A SUB_LOC file is a modified Macromedia Flash Player Compressed Movie ( .SWF file) used in Submachine Universe, a single-player exploration game developed by Mateusz Skutnik. It contains an interactive animation representing a location within the game. SUB_LOC files are stored within Submachine Universe's SUB_LOC folder.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
